corrected.name: Corrected
corrected.description: Data point has been adjusted from original value.

estimated.name: Estimated
estimated.description: Data point is an estimate in some way, either through infilling techniques or incomplete derivation.

removed.name: Removed
removed.description: Data point was removed by QC.

suspicious.name: Suspicious
suspicious.description: Data point is potentially erroneous or requiring further investigation.

unchecked.name: Unchecked
unchecked.description: Data point has not been verified by QC.
